events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry regarding the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’ll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide a photograph of the item you received along with your order number so we can verify the issue?
Here is a picture of the item and my order number: 123456. As you can see, it’s not the item I actually ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you will receive a full refund in 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund proposal. I appreciate your help resolving this promptly.
The refund process has been completed from our side. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
We just wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund arrived yesterday. Everything is resolved now. Thank you again for your assistance!
We are closing this case as resolved. Please reach out anytime if you need further support.
